陑字的基本解释

陑
ér
古地名，在今中国山西省永济县南。

陑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ér］
［《廣韻》如之切，平之，日。］
古山名。在今山西省永济县境，相传为汤伐桀之处。
[②]［réng］
同“陾1”。亦作“隭2”。
众多貌。一说为筑墙声。

陑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　陑； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1350第09
【廣韻】如之切【集韻】【韻會】人之切【正韻】如支切，?音而。【玉篇】地名。【書序】伊尹相湯，伐桀，升自陑。【傳】陑在河曲之南。【廣韻】本作?。【集韻】或作隭。

陑字的起名意思

暂无。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
ér
Ancient place names, in the south of Yongji County, Shanxi Province, China today.
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ér］
["Guangyun" is like cut, flat, day. ]
Ancient mountain name. In today's Yongji County, Shanxi Province, according to legend, it was the place where Tang smashed Jie.
[②]［réng］
Same as "陾1". Also known as "隭2".
Many appearances. One is the sound of building walls.
Qi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[戌集][Fu Character Department] 　陑; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1350 No. 09
[Guang Yun] Such as cutting [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Human cutting [Zheng Yun] such as branch cutting, sound and. 【Jade articles】Place names. [Book Preface] Yiyinxiangtang, cutting Jie, rising from Que. 【Biography】Que is in the south of Hequ. [Guang Yun] This work?. [Ji Yun] Or as Yun.
